content.p: UNICAS brings together cross-disciplinary groups from across the University and provides funding for novel research projects. We organise regular sandpit events to facilitate the networking of researchers from different faculties, schools and departments, allowing them to showcase their expertise and develop new research ideas. UNICAS also runs a number of events to showcase our equipment and expertise to colleagues across the university and to partners across the region. Get in touch: research.innovation@nottingham.ac.uk Jubilee Conference Centre Jubilee Campus Triumph Road Nottingham, NG8 1DH
